Detailed Description

Traverse Component

Copyright 2013 University of Washington, School of Nursing. http://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause

Think of it like a SAX parser for our survey: you define functions that it should run every time it comes to an item.

Abstract the process of walking through the project tree and executing a function at each step. Lots of code (calculations, skipped questions, etc.) can be refactored into this pattern. TraverseSkippedComponent Uses the Traverse abstract class to walk through the survey session and return an array of data to show on the skipped questions page.

Rules: keep a question if it has no analysis value and isn't on a page that should be skipped. Returns: the array needed for the skipped Questions view: [ ["Questionnaire" => Title, "Questions" => ["text" => Question Text, "page_id" => ID of the question's page]]]

Member Function Documentation

TraverseSkippedComponent::run (  ) 

Note that the code in this fxn is not specific to traversing skipped, tho the fxns it calls are.
